You have entered the House of Hades
***************************************************

Hey there, Zagreus! I've got orders from the boss to take you on a one way trip to the underworld, so here we go.



The only thing I hate more than waiting is making OTHER people wait. So just use the following link for express delivery to your feed: https://hades-net.herokuapp.com.



Anyways, wish I could stay, but I've got places to be. Enjoy your eternal stay, and see you around!


Later,

Hermes
